description:
This Is an era of Ruby on Rails and why not? Its the most agile framework for developing web applications.

Folks, say that start learning rails and learn ruby with it. The experienced developers say that "Learn Ruby before Rails if you want to become a professional in the field". Also, a good understanding of ruby concepts can really speed up the pace with which you learn Rails. And my dad says, "Its never a waste if you invest in building a strong foundation"

So, here I am with my course for you 'Learn Ruby before Rails'.

The course includes live coding sessions.

Every lecture is followed by a quiz. The course is structured maintaining continuity , for a better understanding of the subject.

If you are looking for a strong foundation in Ruby language which is a must for a Rails developer, I am honored to present this course to you.

I wish you a happy and continuous learning.
title: Learn Ruby Before Rails- A Ruby Primer for Beginners
